select l.g_id,l.g_model,s.s_id,s.g_price,s.g_quantity,u.s_store_name,p.pic_path from ( select g_id,g_model from laptop union select g_id,g_model from camera union select g_id,g_model from phone ) l left join sellers_goods s on l.g_id = s.g_id left join user u on s.s_id = u.u_id left join picture p on l.g_id = p.g_id where 1=1
and l.g_model like concat('%','G','%')
and p.pic_path like '%index'
